channel.title: Jordan Peterson Guest Appearances & Highlights
channel.description: A custom playlist of podcasts featuring Jordan Peterson, with prioritized guest appearances on shows like The Joe Rogan Experience and Your Mom's House.
channel.itunes:author: Generated Playlist

item.title: The Joe Rogan Experience #1769 - Dr. Jordan Peterson
item.description: Dr. Jordan B. Peterson is a clinical psychologist and professor emeritus at the University of Toronto. He returns to the JRE to discuss a wide range of topics.

item.title: The Joe Rogan Experience #1139 - Jordan Peterson
item.description: One of the most popular and impactful conversations between Joe Rogan and Jordan Peterson, covering meaning, chaos, order, and personal responsibility.

item.title: Your Mom's House Ep. 685 - Dr. Jordan Peterson
item.description: Dr. Jordan Peterson joins Tom Segura and Christina P for a fascinating and often humorous conversation on the Your Mom's House podcast.

item.title: The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast - S4 E21: The Sovereign Individual with Robert Breedlove
item.description: Dr. Jordan B. Peterson and Robert Breedlove discuss the profound implications of decentralized technology, as outlined in the book "The Sovereign Individual."

item.title: The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast - S4 E1: A New Year's Letter to the World
item.description: Dr. Peterson's thoughts on the state of the world and his hopes for the future, delivered as a letter to his listeners.

item.title: The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast - Biblical Series I: Introduction to the Idea of God
item.description: The first lecture in Dr. Peterson's highly popular psychological lecture series on the book of Genesis. This episode sets the stage for the entire series.

item.title: The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast - Reality and the Sacred | Jonathan Pageau
item.description: Dr. Peterson is joined by Jonathan Pageau, a symbolic thinker, artist, and YouTuber, to discuss symbolism, mythology, and how ancient stories shape our perception of reality.
